content: 4 knit even around 88 stitches round 5 k2tog k18 ssk in each section around 80 stitches round 6 knit even around 80 stitches round 7 k2tog k16 ssk in each section around 72 stitches round 8 knit even around 72 stitches your decreases will happen every round now round 9 k2tog k14 ssk in each section around 64 stitches round 10 k2tog k12 ssk in each section around 56 stitches round 11 k2tog k10 ssk in each section around 48 stitches round 12 k2tog k8 ssk in each section around 40 stitches round 13 k2tog k6 ssk in each section 32 stitches round 14 k2tog k4 ssk in each section 24 stitches round 15 k2tog k2 ssk in each section 16 stitches round 16 k2tog ssk in each section 8 stitches run yarn through last 12 stitches pull together slightly secure and run in tail i hope you enjoyed this pattern it has not been tested by anyone but me so if you have questions please do not hesitate to ask i ll do my best to help also email me with any problems and i will fix the pattern so others will not have issues thank you disclaimer **this is my own graph and hat pattern i did graph the creeper of my own accord i apologize if it s close to your graph but there are only so many ways to graph a creeper it s pretty simple i went out of my way to try to do a size and graph that wasn t like anyone else s i don t care if you use the graph at all the hat is also my own pattern out of my head a lot of math and time went into creating this pattern please be courteous and use it wisely thank you for understanding** tracey mcdowell 2013 email chapeautogo@gmail com facebook chapeautogo blog http //chapeautogo blogspot com add me on ravelry traceytmcdowell
